title: Straight Shooting
description: A cattleman determines to drive the farmers off the range, but one of his hired guns turns against him to protect a farmer's family.

title: Just Pals
description: A town ne'er-do-well befriends a young boy and tries to clear his name after being accused of embezzlement.

title: Cameo Kirby
description: A riverboat gambler wins the deed to a plantation but falls in love with the daughter of the man he ruined.

title: The Iron Horse
description: A man seeks to find his father's killer and aid in the construction of the transcontinental railroad.

title: 3 Bad Men
description: Three outlaws find a young woman whose father has been killed and decide to protect her and help her find a husband.

title: Four Sons
description: A Bavarian widow sees her four sons go off to fight in World War I, with one fighting for the Americans.

title: Hangman's House
description: In Ireland, a man kills a rival in self-defense and goes into exile, later returning to protect his sister from a forced marriage.

title: Riley the Cop
description: A police officer is sent to Germany to extradite a suspect but ends up having a good time in beer gardens.

title: Strong Boy
description: A railway porter with big ambitions tries to save a train from robbers.

title: The Black Watch
description: A British officer is assigned a secret mission in India during World War I, causing his regiment to believe he is a coward.

title: Salute
description: Two brothers, one at West Point and the other at Annapolis, face off on the football field.

title: Men Without Women
description: The crew of a submarine trapped on the ocean floor must deal with dwindling oxygen and rising tensions.

title: Born Reckless
description: A gangster is drafted into the army during World War I and becomes a hero, but struggles to go straight after the war.

title: Up the River
description: Two convicts escape prison to help a friend who is being blackmailed, intending to break back in afterwards.

title: Seas Beneath
description: During WWI, a US Mystery Ship, a schooner with a hidden gun, baits a German U-boat.

title: The Brat
description: A novelist brings a chorus girl home to study her for a character in his book, much to the dismay of his snobbish family.

title: Arrowsmith
description: A dedicated young doctor struggles to maintain his integrity and scientific ideals in the face of commercial pressures and personal tragedy.

title: Air Mail
description: The pilots of a desert air mail station face danger and romance.

title: Flesh
description: A German wrestler falls for an ex-convict woman who is trying to hide her past and her boyfriend.

title: Pilgrimage
description: A possessive mother sends her son to World War I to separate him from his girlfriend, and later goes on a pilgrimage to France to visit his grave.

title: Doctor Bull
description: An old-fashioned country doctor fights for his job and his reputation against the small-minded townspeople.

title: The Lost Patrol
description: A British patrol is stranded in the Mesopotamian desert during World War I and picked off one by one by unseen Arab snipers.

title: The World Moves On
description: Two families, one American and one British, are linked by marriage and business through a century of war and peace.

title: Judge Priest
description: In a small Kentucky town, a judge helps his nephew find romance while engaging in a bit of matchmaking and courtroom maneuvering.

title: The Whole Town's Talking
description: A meek clerk is mistaken for a notorious gangster, leading to a series of complications when the gangster takes advantage of the resemblance.

title: The Informer
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: In 1922 Dublin, an Irish rebel informs on his friend for a reward to buy passage to America, then faces his conscience and the IRA.

title: Steamboat Round the Bend
description: A snake oil salesman enters his steamboat in a race to raise money to help his nephew, who has been wrongly accused of murder.

title: The Prisoner of Shark Island
description: The story of Dr. Samuel Mudd, the physician who treated John Wilkes Booth after Lincoln's assassination and was imprisoned for conspiracy.

title: Mary of Scotland
description: Mary Stuart returns to Scotland to reclaim her throne but faces opposition from nobles and her cousin, Queen Elizabeth I.

title: The Plough and the Stars
description: A young wife tries to keep her husband from fighting in the Irish Citizen Army during the Easter Rising of 1916.

title: Wee Willie Winkie
description: A young girl and her mother travel to India to live with her grandfather, a British army colonel, where she charms the regiment and negotiates peace with a rebel leader.

title: The Hurricane
description: A Polynesian sailor is unjustly imprisoned by a colonial governor, while a massive hurricane threatens the island.

title: Four Men and a Prayer
description: Four brothers band together to prove their father innocent of the dishonorable discharge and murder charges against him.

title: Submarine Patrol
description: A sub-chaser crew during World War I, composed of misfits and a tough captain, proves their worth in dangerous waters.

title: Stagecoach
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: A group of people traveling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other along the way.

title: Young Mr. Lincoln
description: A fictionalized account of the early life of Abraham Lincoln as a lawyer facing his first major case.

title: Drums Along the Mohawk
description: Newlyweds try to establish a farm in the Mohawk Valley but are menaced by Indians and Tories as the Revolutionary War begins.

title: The Grapes of Wrath
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A poor Midwest family is forced off their land and travels to California, suffering the misfortunes of the homeless in the Great Depression.

title: The Long Voyage Home
description: The crew of a merchant ship faces the dangers of the sea and the war, longing for their homes.

title: Tobacco Road
description: A poor sharecropper family faces eviction from their land, relying on their own twisted ingenuity to survive.

title: How Green Was My Valley
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: At the turn of the century in a Welsh mining village, the Morgans bring up their sons to be coal miners, while dealing with strikes and family tragedy.

title: They Were Expendable
description: A naval commander fights to prove the battle-worthiness of the PT boat at the start of World War II in the Philippines.

title: My Darling Clementine
description: Wyatt Earp and his brothers arrive in Tombstone, Arizona, where he becomes the marshal and confronts the Clanton gang.

title: The Fugitive
description: In an unnamed Latin American country where religion is outlawed, a priest tries to escape to a neighboring state, but is continually drawn back to help the people.

title: Fort Apache
description: A by-the-book Lieutenant Colonel clashes with his officers at a remote cavalry post while dealing with an Apache uprising.

title: 3 Godfathers
description: Three outlaws on the run discover a dying woman in the desert and promise to save her baby.

title: She Wore a Yellow Ribbon
description: Captain Nathan Brittles, on the verge of retirement, takes out a last patrol to stop an impending Indian attack.

title: When Willie Comes Marching Home
description: A small-town hero joins the army during World War II, but is frustrated when he is stationed in his own hometown.

title: Wagon Master
description: Two drifting cowboys are hired to guide a wagon train of Mormons to the San Juan Valley.

title: Rio Grande
description: A cavalry officer posted on the Rio Grande is confronted by his estranged wife and son while dealing with Apache raids.

title: The Quiet Man
description: A retired American boxer returns to the village of his birth in Ireland, where he falls for a spirited redhead whose brother is contemptuous of their union.

title: What Price Glory
description: Two Marines in World War I France fight over the same woman while dealing with the realities of war.

title: The Sun Shines Bright
description: A Kentucky judge fights for reelection while trying to protect a young woman from scandal and stop a lynch mob.

title: Mogambo
description: A white hunter in Africa is torn between a free-spirited showgirl and a proper married woman.

title: The Long Gray Line
description: The story of Marty Maher, who spent 50 years at West Point as an athletic trainer and friend to future generals.

title: Mister Roberts
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: A cargo ship officer yearns for combat but is stuck dealing with a tyrannical captain and a bored crew.

title: The Searchers
description: A Civil War veteran spends years searching for his niece who was abducted by Comanches, accompanied by her adopted brother.

title: The Wings of Eagles
description: The life story of naval aviator Frank 'Spig' Wead, who overcame a crippling injury to become a successful screenwriter and war hero.

title: The Rising of the Moon
description: Three short stories about Irish life: a man dealing with the law, a train station mishap, and a political prisoner's escape.

title: The Last Hurrah
description: An aging mayor runs for re-election in a changing political landscape, inviting his nephew to observe the campaign.

title: Gideon of Scotland Yard
description: A Scotland Yard inspector deals with a typical day of crime, including robbery, bribery, and murder.

title: The Horse Soldiers
description: A Union Cavalry outfit is sent behind Confederate lines to destroy a railroad supply center, while dealing with a Southern belle and a reluctant doctor.

title: Sergeant Rutledge
description: A black sergeant in the US Cavalry is court-martialed for the rape and murder of a white woman and the murder of her father.

title: Two Rode Together
description: A corrupt marshal is pressured by an army major to negotiate the release of captives held by Comanches.

title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
description: A senator returns to a western town for the funeral of an old friend and tells the story of how he shot the notorious outlaw Liberty Valance.

title: How the West Was Won
description: A family saga covering several decades of Westward expansion in the 19th century.

title: Donovan's Reef
description: Three World War II navy veterans living on a South Pacific island have their idyllic life disrupted when the daughter of one of them arrives to find her father.

title: Cheyenne Autumn
description: The Cheyenne Indians, suffering on their reservation, decide to trek back to their ancestral lands, pursued by the US Army.

title: Young Cassidy
description: A biographical film about the Irish playwright Sean O'Casey, depicting his early life in Dublin and his rise to fame.

title: 7 Women
description: A female doctor arrives at a mission in China in 1935 and clashes with the head of the mission, just as a Mongolian warlord threatens them.
